title: Content Source Setup Wizard
name: Content Source Setup Wizard
story: As an educator, I want to upload course materials and extract teaching points into a domain
description: Multi-step wizard for uploading, extracting, and configuring content sources into a domain

triggers.given: A user initiates the content source setup workflow
triggers.when: The user navigates to /x/content-sources with the wizard view
triggers.then: The wizard steps are loaded from this spec and the flow progresses through all steps
triggers.name: Content Source Wizard Execution

parameters.name: Wizard Step Definitions
parameters.description: Defines the sequence and configuration of wizard steps

steps.label: Add Source
steps.description: Create or upload a content source document

steps.label: Extract
steps.description: Extract teaching points from the uploaded document

steps.label: Review
steps.description: Review and approve extracted teaching points

steps.label: Plan Lessons
steps.description: Generate lesson plan and curriculum structure

steps.label: Preview
steps.description: Preview the AI tutor's first prompt

steps.label: Done
steps.description: Review summary and check course readiness
